{{Disambig-two|band|animal|[[Camels]]}}

'''Camel''' is an English progressive rock band, formed in 1971.

In the 1974 album "Mirage" they included a three-part song called "[[Nimrodel / Procession / White Rider]]". The first two parts are instrumental and the last part is a short description of [[Gandalf]].
